Name: Flee
Description: Escape from battle with high probability.

Name: Detect
Description: See the enemy's items.

Name: What's That!?
Description: Allows back attack.

Name: Soul Blade
Description: Draws out the hidden power in thief swords.

Name: Annoy
Description: Causes Trouble to the target.

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Sacrifice yourself to restore HP and MP to the other party members.

Name: Lucky Seven
Description: Deals physical damage by luck.

Name: Thievery
Description: Deals physical damage to the target based on amount of stealing done..

Name: Shiva
Description: Causes Ice damage to all enemies.

Name: Ifrit
Description: Causes Fire damage to all enemies.

Name: Ramuh
Description: Causes Thunder damage to all enemies.

Name: Atomos
Description: Reduces all enemies' HP. Damage based on enemy HP.

Name: Odin
Description: Causes KO to all enemies.

Name: Leviathan
Description: Causes Water damage to all enemies.

Name: Bahamut
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage to all enemies.

Name: Ark
Description: Causes Shadow damage to all enemies.

Name: Cure
Description: Restores HP of single/multiple targets.

Name: Cura
Description: Restores a lot of HP of single/multiple targets.

Name: Curaga
Description: Restores big-time HP of single/multiple targets.

Name: Life
Description: Recover from KO.

Name: Scan
Description: Scan enemy to determine HP, MP, and weaknesses.

Name: Panacea
Description: Removes Venom and Poison.

Name: Stona
Description: Removes Petrify and Gradual Petrify.

Name: Shell
Description: Reduces damage from magic attacks.

Name: Protect
Description: Reduces damage from physical attacks.

Name: Silence
Description: Causes Silence, which disables magic in single/multiple targets.

Name: Mini
Description: Makes single/multiple targets smaller.

Name: Reflect
Description: Reflects magic attacks back onto caster.

Name: Confuse
Description: Causes Confuse, which makes single/multiple targets erratic.

Name: Berserk
Description: Causes single/multiple targets to attack uncontrollably.

Name: Blind
Description: Causes Darkness, which hinders accuracy of physical attacks.

Name: Float
Description: Allows single/multiple targets to float in the air.

Name: Fire
Description: Causes Fire damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Fira
Description: Causes a lot of Fire damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Firaga
Description: Causes big-time Fire damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Sleep
Description: Puts single/multiple targets to sleep.

Name: Blizzard
Description: Causes Ice damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Blizzara
Description: Causes a lot of Ice damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Blizzaga
Description: Causes big-time Ice damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Slow
Description: Slows down ATB gauge.

Name: Thunder
Description: Causes Thunder damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Thundara
Description: Causes a lot of Thunder damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Thundaga
Description: Causes big-time Thunder damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Stop
Description: Stops targets from taking any action.

Name: Poison
Description: Causes Poison to single/multiple targets.

Name: Bio
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage and Poison to sing./mult. targets.

Name: Osmose
Description: Absorbs MP from the target and transfers it to the spell caster.

Name: Drain
Description: Drains HP from the target and transfers it to the spell caster.

Name: Demi
Description: Amount of damage depends on the target's HP.

Name: Comet
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage.

Name: Death
Description: KO's the target.

Name: Break
Description: Causes Petrify.

Name: Water
Description: Causes Water damage to single/multiple targets.

Name: Meteor
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage to all enemies.

Name: Flare
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage.

Name: Doomsday
Description: Causes Shadow damage to all targets.

Name: Darkside
Description: Reduces your HP to cause Shadow damage to the enemy.

Name: Minus Strike
Description: Damages with the difference between your max HP and current HP.

Name: Iai Strike
Description: Knocks Out the target.

Name: Power Break
Description: Reduces the enemy's Attack Pwr.

Name: Armor Break
Description: Reduces the enemy's Defence.

Name: Mental Break
Description: Reduces the enemy's Magic Def.

Name: Magic Break
Description: Reduces the enemy's Magic.

Name: Charge!
Description: Makes all Near Death party members 'Attack.'

Name: Thunder Slash
Description: Causes Thunder damage to the enemy.

Name: Stock Break
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage to all enemies.

Name: Climhazzard
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage to all enemies.

Name: Shock
Description: Deals physical damage to the enemy.

Name: Goblin Punch
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage to the enemy.

Name: Lv5 Death
Description: KOs all enemies whose levels are multiples of 5.

Name: Lv4 Holy
Description: Causes Holy damage to enemies whose levels are multiples of 4.

Name: Lv3 Def-less
Description: Reduces Defence of enemies whose levels are multiples of 3.

Name: Doom
Description: Casts Doom on the target.

Name: Roulette
Description: Randomly KOs a target.

Name: Aqua Breath
Description: Causes Water damage to all enemies.

Name: Mighty Guard
Description: Casts Shell and Protect on all party members.

Name: Matra Magic
Description: Reduces the target's HP to 1.

Name: Bad Breath
Description: Causes Confuse, Darkness, Poison, Slow, and Mini to the enemy.

Name: Limit Glove
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage to the target when your HP is 1.

Name: 1,000 Needles
Description: Reduces the enemy's HP by 1,000.

Name: Pumpkin Head
Description: Damages with the difference between your max HP and current HP.

Name: Night
Description: Causes Sleep to all targets.

Name: Twister
Description: Causes Wind damage to all enemies.

Name: Earth Shake
Description: Causes Earth damage to all enemies.

Name: Angel's Snack
Description: Uses Remedy on all party members.

Name: Frog Drop
Description: Amount of damage depends on the number of frogs you have caught.

Name: White Wind
Description: Restores HP of all party members.

Name: Vanish
Description: Makes a party member disappear.

Name: Frost
Description: Causes Freeze to the enemy.

Name: Mustard Bomb
Description: Causes Heat to the enemy.

Name: Magic Hammer
Description: Reduces the enemy's MP.

Name: Auto-Life
Description: Casts Life when KO'd.

Name: Reis's Wind
Description: Casts Regen on all party members.

Name: Lancer
Description: Reduces the enemy's HP and MP.

Name: White Draw
Description: Restores MP of all party members.

Name: Luna
Description: Causes Berserk to all targets.

Name: Six Dragons
Description: Drains HP and MP from two party members to give to other two.

Name: Cherry Blossom
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage to all enemies.

Name: Dragon's Crest
Description: Deals physical damage to the enemy based on number of dragons killed.

Name: Dragon Breath
Description: Reduces HP of all enemies.

Name: Carbuncle
Description: Casts Reflect, Haste (Emerald), Protect (Moonstone), or Vanish (Diamond) on all party members.

Name: Fenrir
Description: Causes Earth damage or Wind Damage (Maiden Prayer) to all enemies.

Name: Phoenix
Description: Causes Fire damage to all enemies, and all party members recover from KO.

Name: Madeen
Description: Causes Holy Damage to all enemies.

Name: Regen
Description: Gradually restores HP.

Name: Full-life
Description: Recover from KO with full HP.

Name: Esuna
Description: Removes various abnormal status effects.

Name: Haste
Description: Speeds up ATB gauge.

Name: Dispel
Description: Removes abnormal status caused by magic attacks.

Name: Might
Description: Raises physical attack power.

Name: Jewel
Description: Extracts Ore from a target.

Name: Holy
Description: Causes Holy damage.

Name: Chakra
Description: Restores HP and MP of one party member.

Name: Spare Change
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage to the enemy by using gil.

Name: Curse
Description: Makes the enemy weak against some elemental property.

Name: Aura
Description: Casts Auto-Life and Regen on one party member.

Name: No Mercy
Description: Causes Non-elemental damage to the enemy.

Name: Revive
Description: Recover from KO.

Name: Demi Shock
Description: Amount of damage depends on the enemy's HP.

Name: Countdown
Description: Casts Doom on the enemy.
